message: Can we forward this to the member who is a professional toy designer?  He made the little red tin robot that moves.  I could look up his name in the notes.  Also, when contacting, see if we can borrow the robot for WburgWalks?
Can we make a re-doubled effort to get this information to Bill.  I PM'ed him on Convore but didn't get a response.  Can you email me his email address?
